body:
Comment 3 by **mischief@offblast.org**: 
who is we? i'm unfortunately not an expert in ken's compilers. i have no clue how to
make it stop running out of registers in complex expressions.

i tested on 9front's 8c, but it affects Plan 9 from Bell Labs 8c too, which is what the
plan9/386 builder runs on.

if you (or someone) can come up with an actual fix, it would be nice to apply it to
9front, bell labs, inferno, ken-cc, and go's compilers, since they all have the same
lineage.
